body_html:
Right, Layer doesn't have a setattr override. Originally they were going to, but just defining it is a performance issue for functional layers (which create Layer objects in a loop and share variables by some other means).

You can add variables to a Model by assigning them to an attribute just like with sub-Layers. add_weight should work too; what's the issue?

body:
Right, Layer doesn't have a __setattr__ override. Originally they were going to, but just defining it is a performance issue for functional layers (which create Layer objects in a loop and share variables by some other means).

You can add variables to a Model by assigning them to an attribute just like with sub-Layers. `add_weight` should work too; what's the issue?
